commonProblems.title: Common Problems & Solutions
commonProblems.subtitle: Try these troubleshooting steps before contacting support. Most issues can be resolved with simple fixes.

noInternet.title: No Internet Connection
solutions: Check if your router is powered on and all lights are normal
Restart your router by unplugging it for 30 seconds
Check if cables are properly connected
Verify if there's a service outage in your area

slowSpeed.title: Slow Internet Speed
solutions: Run a speed test at fast.com or speedtest.net
Move closer to your router for better WiFi signal
Check if other devices are consuming bandwidth

wifiNotWorking.title: WiFi Not Working
solutions: Check if WiFi is enabled on your device
Verify the WiFi password is correct
Check for WiFi interference from other devices

frequentDisconnections.title: Frequent Disconnections
solutions: Check cable connections for any damage
Move router away from other electronic devices
Contact support for line quality check

stillHavingIssues.title: Still Having Issues?
stillHavingIssues.subtitle: If the above solutions don't work, our technician will visit your location.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our service, billing, and technical support.

billPayment.q: How do I pay my monthly bill?
billPayment.a: You can pay your monthly bill through bKash, Nagad, Rocket, or bank transfer. Our collection agent may also visit your location for cash collection. Contact support for payment details.

installation.a: After you request a connection, our team will survey your location within 24 hours. Installation typically takes 2-3 hours and is completely free for standard setups.

packageChange.q: Can I upgrade or downgrade my package?
packageChange.a: Yes! You can change your package at any time. The change will take effect from your next billing cycle. Contact support to request a package change.

bdix.q: What is BDIX and why is it unlimited?
bdix.a: BDIX (Bangladesh Internet Exchange) is the local internet exchange. All local content including Facebook, YouTube (cache), local websites, and gaming servers are accessible at maximum speed without counting towards your package limit.

router.a: Yes, we provide a dual-band WiFi router with every new connection at no extra cost. The router remains our property and should be returned if you discontinue the service.

technicalIssues.q: What happens if I face technical issues?
technicalIssues.a: Our 24/7 support team is always ready to help. You can reach us via WhatsApp, phone, or email. For most issues, we can provide remote assistance. For hardware issues, our technician will visit within 24 hours.

contract.q: Is there a contract or commitment period?
contract.a: No long-term contracts! Our service is month-to-month. You can cancel anytime with 15 days notice.

hero.title: Bill
hero.subtitle: Pay your internet bill easily using bKash or Nagad. Follow the simple steps below.

steps.dialBkash: Dial *247# on your bKash activated mobile phone
steps.dialNagad: Dial *167# on your Nagad activated mobile phone
steps.choosePayment: Choose option 4. Payment from the menu
steps.chooseSendMoney: Choose option 1. Send Money from the menu
steps.enterCustomerId: Enter your Customer ID as reference
steps.enterBkashPin: Enter your bKash PIN to confirm payment
steps.enterNagadPin: Enter your Nagad PIN to confirm payment
steps.confirmationSms: You will receive a confirmation SMS with TrxID

importantNotes.title: Important Notes
notes: Always use your Customer ID as the reference
Save the TrxID from the confirmation message
Contact us if payment doesn't reflect within 24 hours
For any payment issues, WhatsApp us with your TrxID
